Ilminster honours Gisborne’s double gold medallist Hoskin and fellow Olympians https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/30/ilminster-honours-gisbornes-double-gold-medallist-hoskin-and-fellow-olympians/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/30/ilminster-honours-gisbornes-double-gold-medallist-hoskin-and-fellow-olympians/ Wynsley Wrigley'There must be something in our water.'Thu, 29 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Gisborne's Olympic Games heroes: Canoe sprints reserve Zach Ferkins (left), media attaché Diana Dobson, double gold medal-winning canoeist Alicia Hoskin, surfer Saffi Vette and hockey referee Amber Church have been honoured at Ilminster Intermediate School. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
Gisborne letters on PM’s back-to-basics message, trust’s $40m distribution https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/30/gisborne-letters-on-pms-back-to-basics-message-trusts-40m-distribution/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/30/gisborne-letters-on-pms-back-to-basics-message-trusts-40m-distribution/ Gisborne letters on council waste, trust's $40m distribution, free speech. Thu, 29 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Two correspondents are hoping Gisborne District Council will heed the call from Prime Minister Christopher Luxon last week for councils to cut wasteful spending and get back to delivering the basics.
Rival factions in Tauranga Sikh Temple brawl and dispute agree to mediation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rival-factions-in-tauranga-sikh-temple-brawl-and-dispute-agree-to-mediation/XKWEQOYMVZBI7A54BX34UKBU2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rival-factions-in-tauranga-sikh-temple-brawl-and-dispute-agree-to-mediation/XKWEQOYMVZBI7A54BX34UKBU2E/ Lincoln TanPolice are investigating a brawl and assault in Tauranga last Saturday. Thu, 29 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 A wild brawl erupted inside a Tauranga Sikh temple before spilling into a nearby mall, where swords were allegedly used. At least one person was taken to hospital.
